Fluid Text Scale Test

--text-fluid-xs
Extra small text for captions, fine print, or metadata
--text-fluid-sm
Small text for secondary information and smaller paragraphs
--text-fluid-md
Medium text for main body content and readable paragraphs
--text-fluid-lg
Large text for subheadings and section titles
--text-fluid-xl
Extra large for main headings and page titles
--text-fluid-2xl
Double extra large for hero headings
--text-fluid-3xl
Triple extra large headlines
--text-fluid-4xl
Massive hero text
